Canada is structured to impart life, beginning from the time of learning to the time of exercising expatriate abilities. It is great to be rewarded with working in reputable surroundings where experienced, and character developers are found, working tirelessly to achieve common great goals, promoting academic excellence, and painting the future great for growing individuals.

The Highest Paying Jobs in Canada 2024

This review is to unveil the available lucrative jobs found in Canada. Canada deserves the best and professional workforce to ride the economy of Canada high.

Moving into Canada would be deal-settled for good. I like to tabulate the various jobs available to Canadian and International citizens.

Jobs Average Annual Salary
Business Operations Manager CAD 164,000
Sales Manager CAD 187,000
Lawyer CAD 192,000
Pilot CAD 195,000
Marketing Manager CAD 196,000
IT Manager CAD 203,000
Petroleum Engineer CAD 208,000
Dentist CAD 233,000
Psychiatrist CAD 293,000
Surgeon CAD 340,000

In the table above, showing some salaries for high-paying jobs in Canada, you would agree that surgeons are paid the most and are considered lucrative jobs in Canada.

Canada is well known for the professional medical services offered by various medical doctors, surgeons, etc. Due to this, several other professions arose: General Surgery, Proctology, Otolaryngology, Dental Surgery, Neurosurgery, Obstetrics and Gynecology, Ophthalmic Surgery, Orthopedic Surgery, Pediatric Surgery, Thoracic Surgery, Urology, Vascular Surgery, Plastic and Maxillofacial Surgery. In line with this, Several Educational Institutions offering related courses are equipped with standard facilities to practice medicine to the core.

On the other hand, engineering constitutes another major core lucrative job in Canada. Among these, several other lucrative jobs are appreciated in Canada, stemming from different state regions.

From the table below, top-paying jobs are classified based on regions of Canada.

The top regions of Canada include Ontario, Quebec, Alberta, and British Columbia.

Highest Paying Jobs in Different Regions of Canada

Jobs/Regions Ontario Quebec Alberta British Columbia
Surgeon 520000 512000 498000 507000
Dentist 456000 425000 416000 457000

In the review above, Ontario is the highest paying medical services region and ranked high in the university ranking parameter.

Working in Canada: Requirements and Processes.

To work in Canada, one must apply for Work Permit. The following are various work permits available in Canada.

  • Temporary Workers
  • Business purposes
  • Permanent Workers
  • Students
  • Agricultural work
  • International Experience Canada

What is the Eligibility Requirement to Obtain a Work Permit in Canada?

  • Submit the filled visa application form
  • Passport or travel document (as specified by the IRCC)
  • Employment offer (by an authorized organization)
  • Letter of Invitation
  • Medical Certificate
  • Relevant documents
  • Filled VFS consent form
  • Sufficient funds for travelling
  • Other documents, if demanded

How Much Does It Cost to Obtain a Work Permit in Canada?

Application type/Category Price (CAD)
Work permit for the individual – (inclusive of extensions) 85
Work permit, including extensions, for a group of performing artists (3 or more) 170
Open work permit holder 255

Do you wish to apply for a program at any University in Canada? Based on the above job fields, Canada has several Universities offering courses that lead to the requirement to work in any field mentioned above.
